class.name: org.n52.sos.ds.hibernate.entities.observation.ereporting.EReportingSeries
class.comment: Table to store a (time-) series which consists of featureOfInterest, observableProperty, procedure, and samplingPoint. Mapping file: mapping/ereporting/EReportingSeries.hbm.xml

column.name: seriesId
column.comment: Table primary key, used for relations

column.name: featureOfInterestId
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related featureOfInterest. Contains "featureOfInterest".featureOfInterestId

column.name: observablePropertyId
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related observableProperty. Contains "observableproperty".observablepropertyid

column.name: procedureId
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related procedure. Contains "procedure".procedureid

column.name: offeringId
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related procedure. Contains "offering".offeringid

column.name: samplingPointId
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related samplingPoint. Contains "samplingPoint".samplingPointId

column.name: offeringId
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related offering. Contains "offering".offeringid

column.name: deleted
column.comment: Flag to indicate that this series is deleted or not. Set if the related procedure is deleted via DeleteSensor operation (OGC SWES 2.0 - DeleteSensor operation)

column.name: published
column.comment: Flag to indicate that this series is published or not. A not published series is not contained in GetObservation and GetDataAvailability responses

column.name: hiddenChild
column.comment: TODO

column.name: firstTimeStamp
column.comment: The time stamp of the first (temporal) observation associated to this series

column.name: lastTimeStamp
column.comment: The time stamp of the last (temporal) observation associated to this series

column.name: firstNumericValue
column.comment: The value of the first (temporal) observation associated to this series

column.name: lastNumericValue
column.comment: The value of the last (temporal) observation associated to this series

column.name: unitId
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related unit of the first/last numeric values . Contains "unit".unitid

column.name: identifier
column.comment: The identifier of the series, gml:identifier. Unique

column.name: codespace
column.comment: Relation/foreign key to the codespace table. Contains the gml:identifier codespace. Optional

column.name: name
column.comment: The name of the series, gml:name. Optional

column.name: codespaceName
column.comment: Relation/foreign key to the codespace table. Contains the gml:name codespace. Optional

column.name: description
column.comment: Description of the series, gml:description. Optional

column.name: seriesType
column.comment: Definition of the series type, e.g. measurement for OM_Measurement. Optional
